__TOC__


The education focus group holds meetings on demand. When members of the group have a topic of interest they can set an agenda and the group leader will then set a date and time for the meeting.

Next meeting: <nowiki>[[http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=4&day=12&year=2009&hour=7&min=0&sec=0&p1=47|21:00 GMT]]</nowiki>

The meeting will be in the #ubuntu-meeting channel on freenode

==== Agenda ====

* Name of Project
* Use of the Ubuntu name
* Training/Education focus
* Identifying Stakeholders
* Integrating with the community
* Developing Online Courseware
* Project Milestones
* Session feedback mechanism

* please add items that you feel need to be discussed in a live meeting.
